name: Way Home (itch) (Dragometh)
description:
Short game made for the third One Minute Game Jam.

Navigate through the stars, and reach the end point within the time limit.

Controls:

- Left click to jump towards your view;

- P to pause.

NOTE: I recommend downloading and playing this game on Windows, as the ending scene is glitched on WebGL. This is because WebGL does not support geometry shaders.
